title: Russian Forces Take Control of Bezymyannoye Settlement in DPR
description: MOSCOW (Sputnik) - Russia’s Yug battlegroup has taken control of the settlement of Bezymyannoye in the Donetsk People's Republic, the Russian Defense Ministry said on Friday.
content:
Russia's Special Operation in Ukraine
On February 24, 2022 Russia launched a special military operation in Ukraine, aiming to liberate the Donbass region where the people's republics of Donetsk and … [+2096 chars]
